list.name: Changes
list.comment: Refactor simulation and data classes: - Enhance `TimeLoop` with dynamic student list creation and random arrival logic. - Add new methods (`intToTime`, `headNode`) and refactor existing ones for consistency in `Student`, `SlideList`, and `studentDetails`. - Standardize constructors and variable names across classes for clarity and maintainability. - Integrate new student initialization logic and adjust slide list creation in `TimeLoop`.

task.summary: Introduce `Slide` class and enhance simulation logic with slide tracking; add `CircularList2` to manage slides and extend main functionality without breaking the prior code.

Refactor classes and enhance simulation logic: - Replace `Queue` with `Student` class for better clarity. - Rename `CircularList` to `StudentList` and `CircularList2` to `SlideList`. - Add `SimulationLoop` class to streamline simulation process. - Improve data representation in `Student` and `Slide` classes.

Enhance simulation loop and list classes with improved functionality: - Add student viewing simulation logic in `SimulationLoop`. - Introduce `cycleDuration()` and `copy()` methods in `SlideList`. - Add `currentStudent()` and size-related improvements in `StudentList`. - Refactor list generation to support configurable sizes for `SlideList` and `StudentList`. - Add documentation for `SlideList` and `StudentList` methods.
Clean up redundant comments and unused code in `Main.java` and `StudentList.java`. Fallback Version

Refactor classes and enhance simulation logic with IDs and names for `Student` and `Slide` classes; integrate file reading for dynamic student name generation and improve exception handling in `SimulationLoop`.
Refactor time simulation logic: - Replace `TestLoop` with `TimeLoop` for enhanced functionality and cleaner output. - Remove unused `TestLoop`. -
Enhance `TimeLoop` output with formatted time display in HH:mm AM/PM format; refine variable naming for clarity.
Display additional time formats (`minutes` and `hours`) in `TimeLoop` output; adjust exit condition to terminate on Day 5.
Refine `TimeLoop` logic: improve AM/PM determination readability, add clarifying comment for `STEP`, and clean up unnecessary sleep statement.
Refactor `TimeLoop`: improve time calculation by adding 12-hour format with AM/PM, adjust variable logic, and enhance formatted output.
Refactor `TimeLoop`: streamline output display by consolidating time formats into a single line and reposition sleep statement for efficiency.
Enhance `Student` and `Main`: add `arrivalTime` to `Student` class, update constructors and `toString()`, and introduce sample students to `Main` for testing.

Refactor `JSONGenerator`, `studentDetails`, and `Main`: - Modify `JSONGenerator` to accept `studentDetails` and update logic. - Replace unused variables in `studentDetails` with `Student` properties. - Clean up `Main` by restructuring `SlideList` and `StudentList` initialization, improving readability.
Implemented Slide objects in the JSONGenerator & studentDetails classes

Refactor and enhance simulation logic: - Introduce new methods in `StudentList` and `SlideList` for detailed property access (`getNameAndID`, `getSlidesWatched`, etc.). - Replace `possibleWords` with `nameRepo` and refactor to use dynamic name selection. - Update `TimeLoop` to integrate slide timers, student timers, and dynamic arrival logic. - Refactor `Main` for improved clarity by removing redundant test logic. - Standardize `Student` and `Slide` constructors and simplify variable naming for consistency.

Refactor simulation and data classes: - Enhance `TimeLoop` with dynamic student list creation and random arrival logic. - Add new methods (`intToTime`, `headNode`) and refactor existing ones for consistency in `Student`, `SlideList`, and `studentDetails`. - Standardize constructors and variable names across classes for clarity and maintainability. - Integrate new student initialization logic and adjust slide list creation in `TimeLoop`.

MESSAGE.value: Introduce `Slide` class and enhance simulation logic with slide tracking; add `CircularList2` to manage slides and extend main functionality without breaking the prior code.

Refactor classes and enhance simulation logic: - Replace `Queue` with `Student` class for better clarity. - Rename `CircularList` to `StudentList` and `CircularList2` to `SlideList`. - Add `SimulationLoop` class to streamline simulation process. - Improve data representation in `Student` and `Slide` classes.

Enhance simulation loop and list classes with improved functionality: - Add student viewing simulation logic in `SimulationLoop`. - Introduce `cycleDuration()` and `copy()` methods in `SlideList`. - Add `currentStudent()` and size-related improvements in `StudentList`. - Refactor list generation to support configurable sizes for `SlideList` and `StudentList`. - Add documentation for `SlideList` and `StudentList` methods.
Clean up redundant comments and unused code in `Main.java` and `StudentList.java`. Fallback Version

Refactor classes and enhance simulation logic with IDs and names for `Student` and `Slide` classes; integrate file reading for dynamic student name generation and improve exception handling in `SimulationLoop`.
Enhance `TestLoop` with colored output and improved day/hour simulation; uncomment `Generator` initialization and clean up `Main.java`.
Uncomment `Generator` initialization, add temporary variable in `Main.java`.
Refactor time simulation logic: - Replace `TestLoop` with `TimeLoop` for enhanced functionality and cleaner output. - Remove unused `TestLoop`. -
Enhance `TimeLoop` output with formatted time display in HH:mm AM/PM format; refine variable naming for clarity.
Display additional time formats (`minutes` and `hours`) in `TimeLoop` output; adjust exit condition to terminate on Day 5.
Refine `TimeLoop` logic: improve AM/PM determination readability, add clarifying comment for `STEP`, and clean up unnecessary sleep statement.
Refactor `TimeLoop`: improve time calculation by adding 12-hour format with AM/PM, adjust variable logic, and enhance formatted output.
Refactor `TimeLoop`: rename variables for clarity, update elapsed time display format, and condense output by removing redundant lines.
Refactor `TimeLoop`: streamline output display by consolidating time formats into a single line and reposition sleep statement for efficiency.
Enhance `Student` and `Main`: add `arrivalTime` to `Student` class, update constructors and `toString()`, and introduce sample students to `Main` for testing.

Refactor `JSONGenerator`, `studentDetails`, and `Main`: - Modify `JSONGenerator` to accept `studentDetails` and update logic. - Replace unused variables in `studentDetails` with `Student` properties. - Clean up `Main` by restructuring `SlideList` and `StudentList` initialization, improving readability.
Implemented Slide objects in the JSONGenerator & studentDetails classes

Refactor and enhance simulation logic: - Introduce new methods in `StudentList` and `SlideList` for detailed property access (`getNameAndID`, `getSlidesWatched`, etc.). - Replace `possibleWords` with `nameRepo` and refactor to use dynamic name selection. - Update `TimeLoop` to integrate slide timers, student timers, and dynamic arrival logic. - Refactor `Main` for improved clarity by removing redundant test logic. - Standardize `Student` and `Slide` constructors and simplify variable naming for consistency.

Refactor simulation and data classes: - Enhance `TimeLoop` with dynamic student list creation and random arrival logic. - Add new methods (`intToTime`, `headNode`) and refactor existing ones for consistency in `Student`, `SlideList`, and `studentDetails`. - Standardize constructors and variable names across classes for clarity and maintainability. - Integrate new student initialization logic and adjust slide list creation in `TimeLoop`.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Refactor simulation and data classes: - Enhance `TimeLoop` with dynamic student list creation and random arrival logic. - Add new methods (`intToTime`, `headNode`) and refactor existing ones for consistency in `Student`, `SlideList`, and `studentDetails`. - Standardize constructors and variable names across classes for clarity and maintainability. - Integrate new student initialization logic and adjust slide list creation in `TimeLoop`.
